pyCGM_Single.pycgmIO.make_sure_path_exists¶

pyCGM_Single.pycgmIO.make_sure_path_exists(path)¶

Creates a file path.

Parameters
pathstr

String of the full file path of the directory to be created.

Raises
Exception

Raised if the path was unable to be created for any reason other than the directory already existing.

Examples

>>> import os
>>> from shutil import rmtree
>>> import tempfile
>>> tmpdirName = tempfile.mkdtemp()
>>> newDirectory = os.path.join(tmpdirName, 'newDirectory')
>>> make_sure_path_exists(newDirectory)
>>> os.path.isdir(newDirectory)
True
>>> rmtree(tmpdirName)

pycgm
